title: Storm Sorcery
content:
nature, specifically the fury of storms and tempests. Storm Sorcerers have an inherent connection to the elements and can command the power of lightning, thunder, wind, and rain to their advantage.

Whether crackling with the energy of ancient deluges or pierced by gales and hurricanes, your lineage is a strange tapestry scrawled by a tempest.

BG3 Sorcerer Class Features

Hit Points at 1st level: 6 + Constitution Modifier Hit Points at Higher Levels: 4 + Constitution Modifier

Weapons: Daggers
